meanings.definition: A curve that can be described by a sine or cosine function.
meanings.sent1: The graph of the function resembled a sinusoid.
meanings.sent2: The sinusoid on the graph showed a smooth wave pattern.
meanings.sent3: I tried to draw a sinusoid on my notebook, but it ended up looking like a wavy smiley face.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves flowed like a sinusoid, gracefully rising and falling.
meanings.sent5: The sinusoid shape of the roller coaster track made the ride thrilling and fun.

meanings.definition: A mathematical function that oscillates in a manner similar to a sine wave.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of the sinusoid in the equation.
meanings.sent2: The sinusoid function repeated its pattern every few seconds.
meanings.sent3: The sinusoid function in the math problem seemed to dance across the page.
meanings.sent4: The music played by the band followed a sinusoid rhythm, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The sinusoid pattern in the data indicated a regular fluctuation in values.
